<html>
<head>
<style>
	.state{
		fill: none;
		stroke: #a9a9a9;
		stroke-width: 1;
	}
	.state:hover{
		fill-opacity:0.5;
	}
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg width="400" height="280" id="map" transform="scale(0.4)"></svg>
<script src="js/uStates.js"></script>
<script src="js/d3.v3.min.js"></script>
<script>

	var click = function(state) {
	    console.log({ country: 'US', state: state.id });
	};

	var data ={};
	["HI", "AK", "FL", "SC", "GA", "AL", "NC", "TN", "RI", "CT", "MA",
	"ME", "NH", "VT", "NY", "NJ", "PA", "DE", "MD", "WV", "KY", "OH",
	"MI", "WY", "MT", "ID", "WA", "DC", "TX", "CA", "AZ", "NV", "UT",
	"CO", "NM", "OR", "ND", "SD", "NE", "IA", "MS", "IN", "IL", "MN",
	"WI", "MO", "AR", "OK", "KS", "LS", "VA"]
		.forEach(function(d){
			var low=Math.round(100*Math.random());
			data[d]={color:d3.interpolate("#ffffcc", "#800026")(low/100)};
		});

	uStates.draw("#map", data, click);
</script>

</body>
</html>
